description:
Are you interested in software project management ? Do not waste your time and money ! Enroll in the most COMPLETE sofware project management training!

  • Remember 30 Days of MONEY BACK is guaranteed if you will not be satisfied
  • You will have LIFE TIME ACCESS for this course.

Have you ever wondered how it is like to work as a sofware project manager in a large enterprise ? Do you want to become an outstanding software project manager in IT industry ?With this course you will learn how software project management is done step by step in a large bank, telecom operator, tecnhology giant company or any company of your dreams with real world examples !

Learn and Master the Software Project Management For Large Enterprise Practically

  1. You will consolidate theoratical software project management knowledge with practical applications
  2. You will learn characteristics of large enterprises and where the IT function corresponds in the organization.
  3. You will understand the importance of software for large companies with a strategic perspective
  4. You will gain technical and behavioral competencies about software project management
  5. You will learn advantages and disadvantages of different software project management methodologies and learn to choose the most appropriate one regarding the organization and the project type
  6. You will learn to manage a software project step by step
  7. You will understand the tricky situations, pitfalls, do's and don't from software project initiation to software project closure

As a result of the Technology age, IT investments made by large enterprises are increasing with tremendeous momentum. Nowadays software is not a support function but the most powerful weapon which determines the business strategies and brings success in business world.

By enrolling this course, you will be able to :

  • Learn software project management for Large Enterprise
  • Take a big step for you career to work in a Large Enterprise!
  • Gain the soft skills and technical skills for software project management
  • Learn pitfalls and do's and don'ts for each phase of software project management!
  • Practice with more than 100 questions!
  • Get downloadable handouts for each session
  • Get support from the instructor within 24 hours!
  • Benefit from the harmonization of theory and real life experience
  • Learn different software project management methodologies
  • Earn 3 PDUs to maintain your PMP certificate if you have already one!

At this point, do you want to take a big step in your career and become a software project manager who makes a difference ? This is why I am here to help you achieve this purpose. Unlike other courses I will share real experiences in an enjoyable way just like a pill. At the end of this course you will feel like you have worked in a large enterprise as a software project manager and find a lot of answers of questions in mind.
title: Software Project Management For Large Enterprise
